targets.query: SELECT last("pressure") FROM "weather" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$Locations$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "location" fill(null)
SELECT LAST(temperature_c) - ( (100 - LAST(humidity)) / 5 ) AS dew_point_c FROM weather WHERE location='outside';
SELECT ((LAST(temperature_c) - ( (100 - LAST(humidity)) / 5 )) * 9/5) + 32 AS dew_point_f FROM weather WHERE location='outside';
